body_html: That question was a bit broad -- I think you were asking how to use skflow to compute confusion matrix on CIFAR input pipeline which possibly nobody has done before, hence no answers. I think if you break this task into smaller tasks, maybe only using TensorFlow, you'd have better luck. Closing this for now since it's not a bug or feature request.

body: That question was a bit broad -- I think you were asking how to use skflow to compute confusion matrix on CIFAR input pipeline which possibly nobody has done before, hence no answers. I think if you break this task into smaller tasks, maybe only using TensorFlow, you'd have better luck. Closing this for now since it's not a bug or feature request.
